Room.Name: Highland Avenue/Netherworld Lane Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Netherworld Lane and Highland Avenue.
Room.LongDescription: Highland Avenue runs north and south, parallel to the eastern City Walls through most of the eastern half of the city. Netherworld Lane runs west from Highland and eventually runs into the western City Wall on the other side of the city. The Highland Stables are located on the southwestern corner of the intersection and the Crimson Dragon Traveler's Lodge is located on the northwestern corner.
